alert.note: Alert for Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 15 at 7:09PM CST until November 16 at 4:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW EXPECTED IN FAR NORTHEAST AND EAST CENTRAL WISCONSIN... .Lake effect snow showers will bring significant accumulations to much of far northeast and east central Wisconsin tonight into early Wednesday. The heaviest snows will occur in southern Marinette and southern Oconto counties tonight. Motorists should anticipate hazardous travel conditions, with reduced visibility and snow covered roads. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Southern Marinette County and Southern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
